text:
Release date
March 2024
Question asked
Can you clarify the ‘global percentage reported at the country level’ in ESRS S1 paragraph 63?
ESRS reference
ESRS S1 paragraphs 63, AR 69 and AR 70
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 217 of 278
ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
Key Terms
Social dialogue; employees - global percentage; significant employment
Background
